members.joinCircumstances: Founded the Neo Marines after leaving the Marines.
Defected from the Marines to join Z's Neo Marines, competing for the position of Z's second-in-command.
Followed Z from the Marines, defeated Shuzo in a five-hour duel to become Z's right hand.

keyMoments.title: Neo Marines Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Neo Marines make their first appearance in the series, attacking Marine forces and targeting Panz Fry. Their extremist ideology of eliminating all pirates is revealed.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the primary antagonist organization of the Z's Ambition Arc and establishes the ideological conflict with the Marines.

keyMoments.title: Neo Marine Ideology Explained
keyMoments.description: Shuzo reveals the Neo Marines' philosophy to Momonga, explaining their belief that pirates must be eliminated rather than imprisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the radical nature of the Neo Marines and their break from traditional Marine justice.

ships.description: The admiral's flagship, larger and with more elaborate design than standard Neo Marine vessels. Most Neo Marine ships are built as ironclad warships with steel plate hulls.

jollyRoger.description: The Neo Marines raise their own jolly roger, distinct from the standard Marine insignia.

ideology: Radical elimination of all pirates rather than imprisonment. The Neo Marines believe the traditional Marine approach of capturing and imprisoning pirates is insufficient, and seek to end the Golden Age of Piracy through extreme measures.
goals: Execute the Grand Reboot plan to destroy the New World using Dyna Stones
End the Golden Age of Piracy
